activity: Preterite vs Imperfect Drill (Mixed AR/ER/IR) - 15 Questions
prompt: Quiz me on the difference between Preterite (Indefinido) and Imperfect (Imperfecto). Mix regular -AR, -ER, and -IR verbs. Ask 15 questions total. For each, give me a sentence in English and the verb infinitive, and ask me to translate the verb into the correct past tense based on the context (completed action vs ongoing/habitual). Correct me if I'm wrong and explain why. Use Castilian Spanish with vosotros.
